  data_fn: "20191017122445_temp_thresh.csv"

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
```

## Purpose

This script imports, summarizes, and shows basic visualizations of an individual's session data.

## Import

```{r}
this_session <- readr::read_csv(paste0(params$csv_path, params$data_fn))
names(this_session)
```

## Visualize

```{r}
this_session %>%
  ggplot(.) +
  aes(x = rt) +
  facet_grid(. ~ correct) +
  geom_histogram()
```
